meta.title: About - Guy Romelle Magayano
meta.description: Learn more about Guy Romelle Magayano, a Senior Full Stack Engineer with over nine years of experience delivering cutting-edge software solutions globally. Guy is known for his deep technical expertise, leadership in full-cycle development, and commitment to building scalable and efficient applications.

openGraph.title: About - Guy Romelle Magayano
openGraph.description: Get to know Guy Romelle Magayano, a Senior Full Stack Engineer with over nine years of experience. Guy has built high-performance, scalable applications using technologies like React, Node.js, Python, and AWS for clients around the world.
openGraph.siteName: Guy Romelle Magayano - Full Stack Engineer

structuredData.name: About Guy Romelle Magayano
structuredData.description: Guy Romelle Magayano is a Senior Full Stack Engineer with over nine years of experience. He specializes in developing full-cycle software solutions using technologies like React, Node.js, and Python. Guy has worked with clients globally, delivering efficient, scalable applications that align with business goals.

hero.heading: About Guy Romelle Magayano
description: Guy Romelle Magayano is a Senior Full Stack Engineer with over nine years of experience in delivering full-cycle software solutions. He specializes in building high-performance, scalable applications that meet business needs and exceed expectations.
